subject: Football
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Hester set an N.F.L. record with his 20th career return touchdown, Julio Jones caught two scoring passes and the Atlanta Falcons beat the Tampa Bay Buccaneers.
snippet: Hester set an N.F.L. record with his 20th career return touchdown, Julio Jones caught two scoring passes and the Atlanta Falcons beat the Tampa Bay Buccaneers.
